### X International Workshop on Locational Analysis and Related Problems

**Seville (Spain), 23–24 January 2020**

Contact: [iwoloca2020@us.es](mailto:iwoloca2020@us.es)

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Welcome

![](images/cartel_IWOLOCA_2020.jpg)

**Welcome,**

The **X International Workshop on Locational Analysis and Related Problems** took place on **January 23–24, 2020 in Seville (Spain)**.

The workshop was organized by the **Spanish Network on Location and Related Problems** and **GELOCA**, the SEIO working group on Location.  
The Spanish Location Network is composed of more than 140 researchers, organized in six thematic nodes and distributed among several Spanish universities.

The aim of the workshop is to promote communication among researchers and to contribute to the development of **locational analysis and related problems**.  
The previous meeting was held in **Cádiz (January 30 – February 1, 2019)**.

The topics of interest include location models, networks, transportation, logistics, exact and heuristic solution methods, and computational geometry.

Researchers and practitioners were invited to present works in the form of **oral communications or posters**.  
For participation, the submission of a **short abstract** was required.
